es.upm.oeg.semanticmeasures.impl.monolingual
Class SoftTFIDFMeasure

java.lang.Object
  es.upm.oeg.semanticmeasures.impl.monolingual.SoftTFIDFMeasure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Relatedness
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoftTFIDFBetweenOntologyEntities, SoftTFIDFBetweenText
public abstract class SoftTFIDFMeasure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Relatedness

Defines the basic methods to operate with the SoftTFIDF metric (see http://secondstring.sourceforge.net/)

Author:
Jorge Gracia

Method Detail

score

public static double score(java.lang.String s,
                           java.lang.String t)
Gives the score between two strings according to the SoftTFIDF measure. It performs camelCase-based split in addition to the default tokenization carried out by the reference implementation of SoftTFIDF

Parameters:
s - source string
t - target string
Returns:
relatedness value

explainScore

public static java.lang.String explainScore(java.lang.String s,
                                            java.lang.String t)
Gives and explains the score between two strings according to the SoftTFIDF measure. It performs camelCase-based split in addition to the default tokenization carried out by the reference implementation of SoftTFIDF

Parameters:
s - source string
t - target string
Returns:
